subject: Re: Shaw Alphabet Books is now online.
msgSnippet: ... Thank you, Michael. The picture that you sent to me privately proves that I m not going crazy and that there s at least one other person out there other
messageBody:
--- In Read_Alphabet@yahoogroups.com, Michael Everson <everson@...> wrote:

> Screen shot of your page shows deep deep black.

Thank you, Michael. The picture that you sent to me privately proves that I'm not going crazy and that there's at least one other person out there other than me that can view my page properly. Yes, the background is a deep, deep back as I'd intended, but it also showed the pictures of the 2 covers and all of the text. That tells me that whatever problem Sid is having, it's a browser issue and nothing to do with the page at all.
